title: Upload
description: import file (xml, csv, tsv or json)
type_desc: With source node you can import your data to metapipe. Your data can be in file (xml, csv, tsv or json) or data can be imported from API.

scripts.hello: out.say('news', 'You added a file import'); context.node.title = context.node.params.file;
scripts.bye: out.say('news', 'Deleted file import node. This does NOT remove data. Bye!');

views.params: <label>Select your file (csv, tsv, xml or json) </label><input type="file" name="file" id="file" required />
